item.title: Ok i compiled and got this error for the yell command
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

client.java:13402: illegal start of expression
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5); && (play
erRights >= 1) {
^
(client.java:13402: "(’;’) expected)
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5); && (play
erRights >= 1) {

          ^

client.java:13414: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (command.startsWith(“99hp”)
^
3 errors
Used “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” to compile your files!
Press any key to continue . . .

Tells u what missing.
